content: lower edge and continue around the outside edge ruffled shawl/cape by linda kaye smith - lks-001r *** attention revised feb 4 2016 to correct hook size *** originally issued decrease 21 2009 - lks-001 5 of 5 row 1 attach yarn with slip_stitch to a double_crochet on bottom edge of left side single_crochet around to beginning stitch when you come to the edge of a row just put two single crochets in stitch or whatever it takes to keep the item flat continue around the outer edge and slip_stitch into beginning stitch do not turn row 2 chain 3 double_crochet into ch3 just completed then 2 double_crochet in each single_crochet around end with slip_stitch in beginning chain 3 stitch do not turn row 3 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet and 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet continue alternating 2 double_crochet and 1 double_crochet around in this way do not turn row 4 slip_stitch in each stitch around and fasten_off wear and enjoy
